original_text: And Moses commanded the children of Israel according to the word of the Lord, saying, The tribe of the sons of Joseph hath said well.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와의 말씀으로 이스라엘 자손에게 명령하여 이르되 요셉 자손 지파의 말이 옳도다

sentences.original_text: And Moses commanded the children of Israel
according to the word of the Lord
saying, The tribe of the sons of Joseph
